meanings.definition: A sheet or band of fibrous tissue that connects muscle to bone or muscle to muscle.
meanings.sent1: The aponeuroses in my leg help connect the muscles to the bones.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the aponeuroses to understand how muscles are connected in the body.
meanings.sent3: The aponeuroses decided to have a party to celebrate their strong bond.
meanings.sent4: The aponeuroses acted like a bridge, linking the muscles and bones together.
meanings.sent5: I could visualize the aponeuroses as strong bands holding everything in place.
